channel.title: Quick question
channel.description:
I keep getting a connection error every once in a while. Mopar, is there a reason for this? when i try and post or when i first access the site, it does this. it also happens when i change pages. so could you help me out. i havnt changed any settings and my internet is fine, but it sometomes tells me connection problems and it wont let me access the site. I have to wait for an hour sometimes for it to actually work so could someone post some help please???
Thanks in advance

item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:15, topic:54499”]Ty for this question.
I was getting over spammed on msn by people which keep asking it :p[/quote]
np…when i try and check my messages or even when i first get online…it says errrer and so i was curious

Read full topic

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

Mostly the Server goes down when it has too many connections. And this mostly happens when Banning / IP banning Someone / Doing Forum Maintenance.

Mopar - Put small waits in the php scripts please, and it should reduce the amount of Connection errors we all get

Read full topic

item.title: Quick question

item.description:
@Skating_On_Java wrote:

If you go on www.moparisthebest.com when www.moparisthebest.com/smf/ is connecting bad it will dsay there are too many people. Like everyone said…Once the RAM is installed it will be much better. Would it do the same to Vbulletin?

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I manage my server, but veritynet is who owns the dedicated server.

It is simply because the traffic has increased a lot, and like jme_009 said I have bought double the amount of RAM that I have and when it is installed the problems will go away.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“deoxys505, post:4, topic:54499”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=76970.msg856476#msg856476 date=1170485921]
Mopar has bought more ram, he’s just waiting for the guy who manages the servers to install it. This should fix the problem.
[/quote]
ahh that’ll be really good… but if i could make a suggestion, i think that we should take out the unused or rarely used forums…or delete old topics that have been locked for more then a year or six months…after we do that the site would be a heck of a lot faster…and we should delete all (if any) banned accounts (perm banned only)[/quote]
It’s a traffic related problem, not an amount of space.

Read full topic
